In 2017, Alabama had the second-highest maternal death rate in the country. 
 
Alabama mothers deserve better than this – which is why I’m working on legislation (like the Maternal CARE Act) to improve outcomes for moms and their babies. https://www.al.com/news/2019/06/deaths-from-pregnancy-and-child-birth-are-often-preventable-alabama-finally-starts-to-take-notice.html …

More often than not our police officers & post office workers are inadvertently exposed to deadly doses of Fentanyl while doing their jobs.

It's time we step up to protect our communities from being exposed to such a deadly drug.
Earlier this year @SenToomey & I introduced a bipartisan bill to penalize Fentanyl-exporting nations that do not adhere to our narcotic control standards.

Recently 2.2 grams of Fentanyl were seized in Limestone county, AL – that is 100 TIMES the lethal amount. 

Enough is enough. pic.twitter.com/7jDnX7hGDg

I'm proud to stand alongside @alzassociation & support the bipartisan #YoungerAlzAct, an important piece of legislation that will improve quality of life for people living with younger-onset Alzheimer’s. #ENDALZ pic.twitter.com/qOg7exUHci
